amendment.description: To allow nonconforming signs damaged by an act of God to be repaired or replaced under certain conditions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3805 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3805 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Bennett. (consideration: CR S4011; text: CR S4011) To allow nonconforming signs damaged by an act of God to be repaired or replaced under certain conditions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3805 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3805 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Bennett.
